meanings.definition: Not censored or restricted in any way.
meanings.sent1: The uncensured book contained all the information without any restrictions.
meanings.sent2: The uncensured movie was available for everyone to watch without any cuts.
meanings.sent3: The uncensured speech made everyone laugh as it was completely open and honest.
meanings.sent4: Her uncensured thoughts flowed freely like a river without any dams.
meanings.sent5: The uncensured artwork displayed the artist's true vision without any alterations.
